alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 1:00AM CST until February 10 at 4:30AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, low lying pastures will flood. Cattle should be moved to higher ground. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:05 AM CST Sunday the stage was 17.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest near 19.5 feet on Monday morning. The river will begin to slowly fall on Tuesday and fall below flood stage by late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
